ygData.subject: Re: EQ weekend update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think I need to make a hotkey for: /g If I am not crowd controlling, chasing down a runner, or playing resist songs, I am playing the mana song. ... A
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 Jan 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> And the real bad news is, I now prefer bards who just play the mana
> song. :-{

I think I need to make a hotkey for:

/g If I am not crowd controlling, chasing down a runner, or
playing resist songs, I am playing the mana song.

> With clarity and the mana song playing, I can sit down during the fight
> and practically regain all the mana a starfire cost me in 15 sec.

A lot of times I wonder what it's like to play without a bard
in the group. :)

Does the song replenish mana at the same rate when you're not
meditating?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
